hooks.name: gradle-project-detection
hooks.description: Detect if the project uses Gradle and offer assistance

action.message: I noticed this is a Gradle project. I can help you build, test, manage dependencies, and more. Type `/gradle-build` to build the project or ask me anything about Gradle.

hooks.name: gradle-build-validation
hooks.description: Optionally validate the build before committing

action.message: Would you like me to run `./gradlew build` to validate the project before committing?

hooks.name: dependency-update-check
hooks.description: Notify when build files are modified

action.message: Build configuration changed. Consider running `./gradlew build` to verify the changes.
